titlestmt.titleproper: Indiana University Student Television records, 2005-2007 C378
titlestmt.subtitle: A Guide to the Records at the Indiana University Archives
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Archives staff.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-02-04 04:49:22 -0500.

did.abstract: Indiana University Student Television (IUSTV) began in 2002 under the name of iuTV and serves as Indiana University's only student managed and produced student television station. The mission of IUSTV is to create informative, entertaining, and inspiring broadcast-quality television for the Indiana University and Bloomington community, while at the same time giving students real-life experience in television production and related fields. Records in this collection include administrative information, correspondence, meeting agendas, program lineups, and other related materials.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Advance notice required.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: Indiana University Student Television (IUSTV) began in 2002 and serves as Indiana University's only student-managed and produced television station. The concept for IUSTV was created by graduate student Kieran Farr in 2002. After Farr and others lobbied the University for space and funding, the organization moved into the former Ashton Campus Card Services offices in 2003, with funding from a newly created mandatory student activity fee. Also in 2003, the organization changed its name from iuTV to IUSTV to comply with a request from IU Radio and Television Services, operator of PBS affiliate WTIU, the leaders of which were concerned about the potential for confusion. In accordance with this name change, IUSTV launched its new and current web site, iustv.com. IUSTV is now located in the Read Center and continues to produce television programming.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is organized into one series: Administrative files.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This small collection is organized into one series, Administrative files, and the folders are arranged alphabetically by folder title. The collection consists of various documents about the history and activities of Indiana University Student Television (IUSTV), from 2005-2007. Much of the collection consists of meeting agendas and administrative information, which include mission statements, and a detailed project summary, amongst other items. The collection also contains some correspondence, semester program lineups, an audition list and application, and a report of a study of student television stations conducted by two IUSTV student executives in 2006.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: The donor(s) of this collection have not transferred their copyrights for the materials to the Trustees of Indiana University. For more information, please contact the Indiana University Archives staff.

The Indiana University Archives respects the intellectual property rights of others and does not claim any copyrights for non-university records, materials in the public domain, or materials for which we do not hold a Deed of Gift. Responsibility for the determination of the copyright status of these materials rests with those persons wishing to reuse the materials. Researchers are responsible for securing permission from copyright owners and any other rights holders for any reuse of these materials that extends beyond fair use or other statutory limitations.

Digital reproductions of archival materials from the Indiana University Archives are made available for noncommercial educational and research purposes only. If you are the copyright holder for any of the digitized materials and have questions about its inclusion on our site, please contact the Indiana University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Indiana University Student Television records, Collection C378, Indiana University Archives, Bloomington.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Transferred from IUSTV to the University Archives in February 2010.
